I started using hike, a simple, beautiful messaging app that's absolutely free.

hike comes with some hilarious emoticons. You can also post Status Updates to your close circle of friends! Think of it like BBM but much, much better!

Get it now and say good bye to plain boring SMS.

Get hike: http://get.hike.in
Hi! Get hike 2.0. Free messaging worldwide. Now with Status Updates and Moods :) - http://get.hike.in/
Posting a mood to twitter can have a maximum of 130 characters.

resources.string: Setup is complete! Tap on \'hi\' to access your hidden chats.
Forgot your password? Reset Hidden Mode. All hidden chats will be deleted.
Hidden Mode will be reset in 30 minutes. All hidden chats will be deleted! Continue?
All hidden chats will be deleted in %1$s minutes
Tap here to reset Hidden Mode now!
Resetting Hidden Mode will delete all your hidden Chats.\nAre you sure?
You can now hide your private chats from the world and read them only with a password. Start a new chat and try it out by tapping on \'hi\'!
Tap and hold on a chat to mark a chat \'Hidden\'.
Youâ€™ve marked a chat visible. Itâ€™ll now be visible to anyone who opens hike.

Hey, join me on hike messenger!\n It\'s the only messaging app that is made in India! Get it now - http://hike.in/ and Hike up your life
Hey! Check out hike messenger. Now send Docs, PPTs, MP3s and more; up to 100MB each! Get it now - http://hike.in/ and Hike up your life
Hey, check out hike messenger. It has amazing stickers & stunning chat themes! Download - http://hike.in and Hike up your life!
Hey, check out hike messenger. It let\'s you show your \'Last Seen\' only to select friends! Download - http://hike.in and Hike up your life!
Hey, check out hike messenger. You can now hide your private chats from others. Download - http://hike.in and Hike up your life!
Hey, check out hike messenger. You can chat with even those friends who are offline. Download - http://hike.in and Hike up your life!
Tap here to post a status update. Only your favorites can see them.

I just downloaded the new hike messenger. What a big change from WhatsApp!

It's got amazing Stickers, the ability to choose who sees my Last Seen and some really cool Chat Themes. 

The best part? Hike has thing called Hidden Mode that lets you hide your private chats, from the world! Awesome!

Download it like asap from http://hike.in!
Only favorites can see your last seen & status updates
Mark your chats as hidden and access with passcode
Send messages to friends even when they are offline
When words canâ€™t express, say it with a sticker
Amazing things you can do on hike
Tap here to send free SMS

Hey, join me on hike, the only messaging app made in India! It lets you show your \'Last Seen\' only to select friends, send messages to friends when they\'re offline and send awesome stickers.\n Also share all types of files - docs, songs, movies etc, up to 100MB each ;) http://get.hike.in/
